paragraphs.name: 42e0
paragraphs.text: Rather than consume YouTube videos all day long, your successful friends have given up consuming for creating. They spend as much time as possible doing the “doing” instead of sitting there watching others have the success they’ve always dreamt of.

paragraphs.name: 5a12
paragraphs.text: While the article is a bit simplistic, it is thought-provoking and of course, a good reminder. As an author and visionary, vision is paramount. It is very easy to be caught up in the day’s shenanigans, the latest in the news and other sorts of distractions. While it would seem to be essential to keep up with the news/fake news, one would find far…

19a7f740da67.title: By this criteria, I must be a very successful person.

paragraphs.name: c694
paragraphs.text: By this criteria, I must be a very successful person. In any case, care to elaborate on “Things that don’t serve them, like the news, are eliminated from their schedule.”?, I agree that pointless news (this man killed his wife type of news) are distracting, don’t serve purpose and are time consuming, but I would imagine that successful people are constantly up to date on how world works.
